It's a lovely brooding shade that feels incredibly elegant and will add a little colour to your surroundings. It'll also do a great job of protecting you too. What makes it even more ideal is that its made from a high grade pvc. That means it's waterproof and capab elegance and sophistication aplenty with this pvc black roller blind.

products.title: Pvc Blackout Fawn Roller Blind
products.description: Lovely, light and creamy this pvc fawn roller blind is a great way to lighten up your space. It makes small rooms seem bigger and is much less stark than a plain white, giving you warmth as well. It's a star performer in the bathroom or any other wet and humid spaces. It's made f lovely, light and creamy this pvc fawn roller blind is a great way to lighten up your space.

products.title: Pvc Blackout Stone Roller Blind
products.description: There's elegance in simplicity and nowhere is that showcased better than this pvc stone roller blind. A stylish shade of grey that's right on trend, it'll give your home a sophisticated new look. While this roller will look great anywhere, the bathroom is where it really excels.

products.title: Basix Blackout Shale Grey 127mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their basix blackout range is an easy and effective method of freshening up your decor. This medium grey 127mm vertical blind, is made of durable fabric and stylish 5 inch vanes. Updating your window blind is a simple way to update the room, and a grey blind instantly revitalises tired-looking window. Pollergen-coated, this blackout vertical blind also helps allergy sufferers with its pollen-resistant fabric, a must for high-pollen seasons.

products.description: Their basix blackout range is an easy and effective method of freshening up your decor. Updating your window blind is a simple way to update the room, and a new white blind instantly refreshes and revitalises tired-looking window. Pollergen-coated, this blackout vertical blind also helps allergy sufferers with its pollen-resistant fabric, a must for high-pollen seasons.

products.title: Basix Blackout Charcoal Grey 127mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their basix blackout range is simple and effective method of freshening up your decor. This dark grey 127mm vertical blind is a cool-toned shade, made of durable fabric, and stylish 5 inch vanes. Updating your window blind is a simple way to update the room, and grey is an easy colour to mix and match accessories with. Dress your bedroom or living room with this vertical blind, which as well as being a blackout fabric is anti-allergy treated, to help you live out your days allergy-free.

products.title: Basix Blackout Alabaster Cream 127mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their basix blackout range is an easy and effective method of freshening up your decor. This cool-toned cream 127mm vertical blind, a traditional neutral shade, is made of durable fabric and stylish 5 inch vanes. Updating your window blind is a simple way to update the room, and cream goes with nearly anything, whether its wooden accessories and floors or modern minimalist themes. Dress your bedroom or living room with this stylish vertical blind, which as well as being a blackout fabric is anti-allergy treated, to help you live out your days allergy-free.

products.title: Moda Blackout Stone Grey Roller Blind
products.description: A lovely neutral grey tone with a stunning textured finish, this moda stone grey fabric is really upping the ante in the designer stakes. It's a blend of homely comfort and real style. The beauty of the colourway, with its flecks and weaves, is that it is so easy to pair with the a lovely neutral grey tone with a stunning textured finish, this moda stone grey fabric is really upping the ante in the designer stakes.

products.title: Moda Blackout Cream Roller Blind
products.description: A creamy delight, this moda roller blind is abundant in softness, delicacy and warmth. The lovely off-white tones will help your home feel open and bright. It has a textured finish to give it a drop of designer style and is perfect for pairing with most colour schemes. Light, dar a creamy delight, this moda roller blind is abundant in softness, delicacy and warmth.

products.title: Moda Blackout Warm Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Whether you're looking for something warming and homely or smart and contemporary, this moda warm grey will fit the bill. It's got a lovely textured finish and is picked out in a stony neutral grey. Grey is ever popular, making a modern and cosy neutral that allows you to showcas whether you're looking for something warming and homely or smart and contemporary, this moda warm grey will fit the bill.

products.title: Cordoba Blackout Atomic Orange Roller Blind
products.description: If you close your eyes and imagine the brightest orange that you ever saw then you may well be seeing atomic orange. Of course, it may be bright but dont forget that it benefits from being blackout too. Atomic orange will undoubtedly add extra vigour to any fun and funky ro if you close your eyes and imagine the brightest orange that you ever saw then you may well be seeing atomic orange.

products.title: Ajanta (Blackout), Rock - Roller Blind
products.description: Ajanta rock is a blackout blind that proves once and for all that style and substance can work together in perfect harmony. The neutral grey combines with an electric pattern that catches the light in a thousand different ways depending on which way you look at it. Now that you've found your dream blinds you can get busy reimagining the rest of your interiors. The floors and walls are natural places to start as they frame your window spaces and help connect them to the rest of your room.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Black - Roller Blind
products.description: The blackest of blacks, the palermo (blackout) black is not for shy and retiring rooms. This is a blind that wants to stand out and be noticed, and noticed it certainly will be. With the latest blackout technology, this blind is a must for a night-time feel all day long. Create a moody focal point in a home office or dining room by adding the palermo black to a monochrome colour scheme, and accessorise with bright red or hot fuchsia if you can't resist a little colour.

products.title: Ajanta (Blackout), Cream - Roller Blind
products.description: The ajanta (blackout) in cream features an off-white abstract patterning on a barely-there, almost gold cream that shimmers gently as the light hits it. It will only be your indoors light that gets to it though, as this powerful blackout blind is every bit as effective as you'd hope at keeping outside light disturbances out. Team with rich creams and the subtlest of golds in a modern, luxurious kitchen, for which the wipe-clean fabric makes it perfect.

products.title: Sarra (Blackout), Palace - Roller Blind
products.description: The sarra (blackout) palace really is a blackout blind fit for royalty, with its deep, dark blue and high quality grained finish. Use to keep light disturbances at bay and don't worry about how often it's used - this blind is durable and will last year upon year. This dark, regal blue will look fantastic in a blue and white kitchen, perhaps with a few bright accents, such as yellow or red. Or hang in the playroom or kids' bedroom for maximum impact against bright, fun wallpapers.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Cerise - Roller Blind
products.description: The vivid hot pink of the palermo (blackout) in cerise will catch your eye every time you enter the room. This blind combines fun with functionality, as its cutting edge blackout fabric and fuss-free design make this a usable and lasting window dressing. Go bright in the bathroom by offsetting the cerise against white walls and complementing it with matching towels and bathroom accessories. It would also make a funky addition to a child's bedroom when paired with lighter pinks and whites.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Cream - Roller Blind
products.description: The palermo (blackout) in cream is a dark, dusky shade of cream, that isn't too far from magnolia. It's the perfect neutral, and what's more, it's hardy, wipe-clean, and simple to use. The high quality material and rolling mechanism of the palermo mean this blackout blind will last, year after year. Couple this rich hue with dark browns and paler creams in a warm, traditional kitchen, or use in the playroom amongst bolder, more playful colours.

products.title: Rapture (Blackout), Code - Roller Blind
products.description: An understated, pale, green-grey shade combined with a natural twig pattern makes the rapture (blackout) code a sophisticated option for the modern home. There's more to this attractive blackout blind than just looks though; the durable fabric and easy-roll mechanism make this a practical choice too. The code is an essential choice for a contemporary kitchen with a garden view. This handsome blind would be most at home amongst subtle earth tones and muted neutrals, and could work beautifully in the hallway or utility room.

products.title: Ajanta (Blackout), Raven - Roller Blind
products.description: The ajanta (blackout) raven is a bold and beautiful metallic blind, with a cracked black pattern spread across its funky background. This pretty, durable, and high quality blind is eye-catching and memorable, and will be the star of the show in any room. The raven will look best amongst colours of a similar ilk, such as other metallic silvers, jet blacks, and cool greys. It would make a fashionable addition to a teenager's room or to a glamourous dining room, where 'luxury' is the word of the day.

products.title: Sarra (Blackout), Icecap - Roller Blind
products.description: Sarra (blackout)'s icecap is a brilliant, vivid white shade that will set accompanying colours alight. The simple, grainy texture of this blind looks similar to woodgrain, and despite the fabric's pale colour, it is an effective blackout blind. Use in a chic, contemporary kitchen with plenty of other white, and the occasional pop of colour here and there. Alternatively, accent boldly coloured walls in a living room by placing the icecap right in the middle, making it a feature all its own.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Light Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: The palermo (blackout) in light grey is soft in colour but hardy in quality, and despite its pale hue, has excellent blackout properties, blocking out any kind of light you need it to. Tame bold reds, bright blues, or neon greens or complement slate greys, ebony blacks, and stark whites; the choice is yours. This is the perfect blind for a monochrome bathroom for a contemporary or industrial look.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Blush - Roller Blind
products.description: Immerse yourself in the pretty pink of the palermo (blackout) blush, a powerful blackout blind that, despite its light colour, will keep out unwanted sunlight, whatever time of day. The blush will add texture and atmosphere to any room, and will suit a light, country kitchen particularly well, so nestle it amongst pretty florals and creams. For a contemporary feel in a bedroom, add to rich purples and glitzy golds; despite the subtlety of this hue, it can add a truly opulent feel when paired correctly.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Midnight - Roller Blind
products.description: The palermo (blackout) midnight really is the colour of night-time, making it a clear choice when it comes to picking a blackout blind, and is uncompromising in its quality - of material, functionality, and colour. Kids who love astrology or space-themed rooms will love the midnight, so add it to their bedroom or playroom with complementary accessories for a really life-like feel. Don't discount the bathroom though; this hue will match plenty of blue and aqua shades and will really stand out against white tiling and silver fittings.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Yellow - Roller Blind
products.description: The soft sunshine of the palermo (blackout) yellow will add a cheery freshness to a window, even when it's doing its job of blocking out the outside light. Add to that the superior quality of the sleek blackout fabric and you have the perfect window covering. Use this blind in a modern country kitchen for both function and style; paired with other pastels and pretty florals, your window covering will give the room a summery, airy feel.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Cameo - Roller Blind
products.description: The soft cream of the palermo (blackout) in cameo offers a subtle, barely-there look, despite being a powerful blackout blind that will block out even the brightest of the sun's rays as and when you need it to. Its durable, wipe-clean material makes for a long-lasting and easy-to-use functional window covering. For a light and airy look in the bathroom, pair up the cameo with dusky lilacs or country greens, and accessories with gold trims and fittings.

products.title: Capri (Blackout), Code - Roller Blind
products.description: Neutrals have a bad reputation for being a little dull and uninteresting, but the capri (blackout) code changes everything. The pale silver patterning on the creamy beige background creates a pretty window covering that is far from boring and will only add interest to whichever room it's placed in. Use the code in a bedroom full of rich browns with modern silver accessories, or in a white or cream living room for a light and luxurious feel.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), White - Roller Blind
products.description: White might not be your first instinct when looking for a blackout blind, but don't rule out the palermo (blackout) white just because of its colour. When it comes to keeping out harmful and distracting uv rays, this blind comes top of the class. The wipe-clean fabric of the palermo range makes this the perfect choice for kitchen windows, and will really gleam paired with colourful patterns and light wood worktops.

products.title: Waves Blackout Beige Roller Blind
products.description: Beige is very much on trend at the moment. A lovely light neutral colour, this waves roller blind also has a lovely textured pattern to add some real sophistication. Made from 100% waterproof pvc, it's perfect for creating a beautiful new space in your bathroom or even your kitch beige is very much on trend at the moment.

products.title: Waves Blackout Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Gorgeous, contemporary grey and a beautiful textured pattern, this waves grey roller blind brings so much style to your surroundings. And the name is apt as it's made from high quality pvc that's 100% waterproof. That makes it a perfect blind for tough environments like kitchens gorgeous, contemporary grey and a beautiful textured pattern, this waves grey roller blind brings so much style to your surroundings.

products.title: Alicante Blackout Marble Black Roller Blind
products.description: Time to add something gorgeous to your bathroom? Finish it off to perfection with this stunning alicante marble black roller blind. It's a mass of beautiful swirls picked out in the most wonderful charcoal tones. What's more, it's made of hardwearing pvc, which means even if you time to add something gorgeous to your bathroom? Finish it off to perfection with this stunning alicante marble black roller blind.

products.title: Alicante Blackout Marble Silver Roller Blind
products.description: Thinking about bringing your bathroom (or any other room) into the 21st century? Why not upgrade with this gorgeous alicante marble silver roller blind. Not only is it incredibly stylish, its also eminently practical. The twirls and swirls on this en vogue grey fabric bring the s thinking about bringing your bathroom (or any other room) into the 21st century? Why not upgrade with this gorgeous alicante marble silver roller blind.

products.title: Waves Blackout White Roller Blind
products.description: Perfect for tough environments, this waves roller blind adds style as well as substance. It's made from a high grade pvc which is 100% waterproof so it'll even work next to the bath. That's not forgetting that it's a gorgeous textured pattern and a light and bright tone to add gl perfect for tough environments, this waves roller blind adds style as well as substance.

products.description: Their luxari pvc blackout range is available in classic colours and is ideal for damp rooms or areas that are exposed to heat. products.title: Concordia Blackout Winchester Grey Roller Blind
products.description: With soothing blue undertones, the concordia winchester grey roller blind is a contemporary and cosseting number. It has soft slubs running through, creating a textured looked too. Its not just about the look though; this roller blind has its practical side too. Backed with with soothing blue undertones, the concordia winchester grey roller blind is a contemporary and cosseting number.

products.title: Ajanta (Blackout), Mode - Roller Blind
products.description: Ajanta mode is one of their most popular blackout blinds right now because of the way in which it cleverly hides an electric pattern just beneath the surface. As the light changes in your room the fabric comes to life and introduces your senses to an aesthetic unlike any other. The electricity of the ajanta pattern is the perfect starting point for those of you looking to inject some energy and vitality to your next design project.

products.title: Rapture (Blackout), Whisper - Roller Blind
products.description: An elegant cream blind with just a hint of sparkle, the rapture (blackout) whisper will adorn your home with luxury. It is hassle-free to clean whilst providing the intimacy of a highly effective blackout blind. This heavenly milk-white colour is the natural partner to a cream colour palette in your kitchen or utility room, or would look fantastic surrounded by forest greens or navy blues in an all-white bathroom.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Palace - Roller Blind
products.description: Palermo(blackout)'s palace is regal and welcoming, and creates a truly cosy feel in any room. Needless to say, its blackout properties are outstanding, and are accompanied by durability and ease of use. The palace sits comfortably amongst the paler shades of lilac and baby blue, which can be combined to create a unique colour scheme for a kitchen. Alternatively, use in the office, amongst calming whites and contemporary chevron patterning, for when you really need to keep the outside out and concentrate.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Sky - Roller Blind
products.description: Pretty as a picture, and cool as you like, the palermo (blackout) in sky is a conveniently subtle way of bringing the outdoors inside. It is deceptively robust, and does as good a job at blacking out light as even the darkest of blinds. The sky will look lovely amongst whites and dainty florals in a bedroom or family bathroom, contributing to a light and airy atmosphere. Or instead, use in a hallway to freshen up its look and add a discreet pop of colour.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Bluebell - Roller Blind
products.description: The palermo (blackout) bluebell couldn't be closer in shade to that of the pretty wildflower itself. This pretty yet simple blind is made from durable, wipe-clean fabric, and has all of the features of its sister blackout blinds. Use in the kitchen amidst cream walls and delicate florals for a spring-like feel and all of the cheer that comes with it, or add it to lilacs and pinks in a child's room, using it to lift out the colours in coordinating patterns.

products.title: Sarra (Blackout), Putty - Roller Blind
products.description: The textured neutral of the sarra (blackout) putty is an accommodating shade of cream that works well with almost any colour it meets. The quality blackout fabric will keep even the brightest uv rays out, as well as night-time disturbances such as headlights and street lamps. Complement rich browns for a traditional colour scheme in the home office, or pair with apple green or sky blue for a fresh, summery feel in the kitchen.
